name: The Last Stand at the Strawberry Shortcake 🍓🍓🍓
name_original: The Last Stand at the Strawberry Shortcake 🍓🍓🍓
description:
The Last Stand at the Strawberry Shortcake

Chaos unfolds as the ant apocalyse overwhelm a small peaceful picnic amonst the lifelong friends Mike Mouse, Benjamin Badger and Frida Frog, as well as all of their twin brothers and sisters.

A game by "The Hacks"
Asger Horn Brorholt
Johannes Elgaard
Jeppe Wehner Lindberg
